name: upgradeMaxVertexSize
description: Upgrade max vertex and index buffer size (96MB)

name: removeCacheFileSize
description: Force map compilation with size over max cache file size

name: allowNonPowerOfTwoDimensionsBitmaps
description: Force map compilation with no power of two dimensions bitmaps

name: forceSingleplayerResourceInternalization
description: Force singleplayer maps to internalize resource files
